title: Student Nurse Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: Very easy and comfortable. Sat at fireplace and waited then went to interview and got a tour and herd back within around a week. Bri is the recruiter and was very helpful
Interview Questions: Tell us about you self and struggles you have faced.

title: Patient Admissions Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bellin Health
Interview Descriptions: Very slow. Application has some issues, recruiter contacted me and I told her the issues with the application and she had me email her my resume which made things much easier. Phone interview with recruiter and then at clinic location, job offer a few days later but had to wait almost a month to train.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Bellin Health?

title: Technical Service Desk Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed through virtual teams with two interviewers, very comfortable and friendly., which made it less stressful and easier to answer the question's.  It was a good experience for my first interview since graduating in May
Interview Questions: How I handle disgruntled customers

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bellin Health
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed for two different positions here. Both had similar interview styles where there were four to five unit staff members who alternated questions. It was an overall friendly environment where I felt comfortable asking questions.
Interview Questions: How do you stay organized

title: Aide Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bellin Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was easy and felt more like I was talking to two old friends. The questions asked were your typical interview questions such as “explain a time you had a conflict with a coworker”
Interview Questions: Describe yourself as an employee

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: Submitted application online. It is nice because information is saved so easy to apply for multiple jobs. Quick response. Recruiter called with one day of submitting application to set up an interview. Was offered in person and virtual interview options
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Bellin?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bellin Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is a panel, you have to submit an application, once they review it they will reach out to schedule an interview. Bellin is very organized and trustworthy. Good luck
Interview Questions: What are your weaknesses and strengths?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Bellin Health
Interview Descriptions: 3 people did interview, questions were normal for job interview. They really want to get to know you which is needed for the position. Everyone was so nice and accomodating. Masks were worn
Interview Questions: Normal questions for job interview

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI)
Interview Descriptions: They asked the average series of question. She described the job as we were walking up to the interview process. There was another nurse who joined up during the interview.
Interview Questions: What made you want to be a CNA?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: 1 call with HR and then a meeting with the team leaders and facilitators. The HR call was more about strengths and and past experiences. The in person interview was more how you would contribute to the unit.
Interview Questions: Give a scenario where you felt like you handled a situation better than a colleague.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: Typical interview questions such as handling work conflict, future 5 year plan. Dont forget to always ask about the culture as this is very important to any organization. The ladies interviewing were very pleasant and accommodating. I asked to have a tour of the unit that I was interviewing for and they were more than happy to allow that
Interview Questions: How did you handle a work place conflict

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Bellin Health
Interview Descriptions: Process took 3-4 weeks. Interviewer was very kind and was very explicit in making sure I was the right person for the job. The process may have taken longer due to how many questions I had, and their willingness to be flexible with my needs and making sure it was a right fit for both parties. Excellent experience.
Interview Questions: What do you want to get out of your career?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: casual process, they are more concerned you fit their culture than anything else. They will teach what you don't know. Quick process with one interview. I met with two people. There was also a shadowing portion to the interview to make sure it was the right fit for me
Interview Questions: why do you want to work here?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: Sit in front of a panel of people.  Those people will then discuss you if you were a good candidate, if so you will receive a phone call back within 2-3 weeks hopefully with a job offer.  You will then have to complete a drug test and a couple of pre-screening to test if you are physically fit for the job.
Interview Questions: Why did you decide to apply to Bellin Health?

title: Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Marinette, WI)
Interview Descriptions: Asked General questions from the onset I got the feeling that I was older than the type of employee they wanted to hire.  Definitely, if you are over 50 don't apply here.  They don't want you.
Interview Questions: Do you always meet deadlines?

title: Patient Admissions Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was done by the hiring manager and the head receptionist, since that was the position I was applying for. The questions were all very standard and it was a simple interview, I basically just answer 2 interview questions and then we ended up talking for a while. I got a tour right after we were done however so at that point I had assumed I got the role. My manager sent me a business card welcoming me to Bellin right after I got hired.
Interview Questions: They wanted to know about my plans for a future job.

title: Clinic Patient Admissions Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Bellin Health in Nov 2014
Interview Descriptions:
I submitted my resume through their site online; called human Resources about a week later to check status and they said each site makes it's own decision on who they will interview.  Received a call for an interview from one of the clinics I applied to (I applied to a few positions) later that day requesting an interview later in the week.  I showed early for the interview, and waited at least 15 minutes past the time I was scheduled; they did seem quite busy though. 

The interview had two others besides me, and was pretty straight forward with most standard questions. It was very business-like and only took about 15 minutes.
Interview Questions: What would you do if you saw a co-worker doing something unethical?

title: Nurses Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Bellin Health
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed for a position at Bellin hospital and the hospital and their staff seemed very professional and kind.  The woman interviewing me was very friendly as well.  It seems like an excellent place to work.
Interview Questions: There was many questions I thought but there wasn't any that were totally off the wall.

title: Referral Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions:
Sit down interview with department head and one or two supervisors. 
They ask you about  your job history, how you handle complaints, etc. Then they will ask you to sit with an employee and listen in to calls to see if it is right for them.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you handled a customer complaint?

title: RN/Triage Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Bellin Health
Interview Descriptions: Team interview is the typical process.  Normally let you know within -2 weeks.
Interview Questions: What is your worst quality?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Bellin Health (Green Bay, WI) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Normal standardized questions, usually 3 people doing the interview, how you answer questions you are rated as a good or bad potential employee.  I was also part of the interview teams later on in my employment.
Interview Questions: How did you resolve a work place conflict?
